text: Don Corleone may refer to: * Vito Corleone, the original Don in The Godfather, played by Marlon Brando and Robert De Niro * Michael Corleone, Vito's son, played by Al Pacino, who took over the control of the family * Vincent Corleone, Sonny's illegitimate son, played by Andy Garcia, who became Michael's successor and the third Don Corleone ==See also== *Don Corleon (born 1978), Jamaican record producer, songwriter, and mixer *Don Coleone, Nigerian singer
title: Don Corleone
